Package hjb.jms

Provides the classes used to register, create and access the JMS objects present in the HJB runtime.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MetadataReaderAssistant.Reader Reader specifies methods for reading an attribute of a JMS ConnectionMetaData.
 

Class Summary
HJBConnection HJBConnection decorates a Connection.
HJBConnectionFactory HJBConnectionFactory decorates a ConnectionFactory, and adds extra methods that allow it access the connections it creates.
HJBExceptionListener HJBExceptionListener logs exception using a Log4j Logger.
HJBMessenger HJBMessenger uses a HJBConnection to send and receive HJBMessages as JMS messages.
HJBProvider HJBProvider represents a JMS Provider registered with HJB.
HJBRoot HJBRoot is the root of an HJB runtime, a registry of the configured Providers.
HJBSessionConsumers HJBSessionConsumers is used to create and maintain JMS Consumers using the Session created by a HJBConnection.
HJBSessionDurableSubscribers HJBSessionDurableSubscribers is used to create and maintain JMS durable subscribers using the Session created by a HJBConnection.
HJBSessionItems HJBSessionItems is a base class that provides behaviour common to those classes that represent items created using the Session created by a HJBConnection.
HJBSessionProducers HJBSessionProducers is used to create and maintain JMS Producers using the Session created by a HJBConnection.
HJBSessionQueueBrowsers HJBSessionQueueBrowsers is used to create and maintain JMS QueueBrowsers using the Session created by a HJBConnection.
MetadataReaderAssistant MetadataReaderAssistant is to used translate values that are attributes of the JMS ConnectionMetaData to encoded HJB form.
MetadataReaderAssistant.BaseReader BaseReader provides methods that implement behavior used by the Readers defined in this class.
ProviderBuilder ProviderBuilder builds a Provider from the contents of a Hashtable.
ProviderStorer ProviderStorer is used to load and/or save the persistent details of a Provider to the filesystem.
SessionMessageFactory SessionMessageFactory allows Sessions to be used a 'keyed' factory for Messages, with the key being the class name of the Message.
 

Package hjb.jms Description

Provides the classes used to register, create and access the JMS objects present in the HJB runtime.
